content:
As an AI language model, I do not have any personal favorites or recommendations, but here are some of the most popular meditation apps out there that you can check out:

1. Headspace
2. Calm
3. Insight Timer
4. 10% Happier
5. Stop, Breathe & Think
6. Breethe
7. Simple Habit
8. Smiling Mind
9. Mindful. 10. The Mindfulness App

Each of these apps offers a range of guided meditations, mindfulness exercises, and other features to support your meditation practice. Try out a few and see which one works best for you!
